website_summaries.verdict: Unless real leather is a must, other bags we tested have more to offer at less expense.
pros: Features rugged metal buckles and canvas lining that is constructed to last
cons: The strap is somewhat stiff and uncomfortable
Has a smell of chemicals that is offensive to some consumers
Comes with fewer pockets and a higher price than others we tested

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality bag for an affordable price. Here are some of my notes on this product 1) This bag can be used as a heavy duty business or laptop bag. I regularly carry my 16inch laptop in this bag which fits comfortably with several other documents. 2) Has enough compartments to carry all necessary items. 3) The bag is made of quality materials which with around a year of use has not begun to crack or tear. Even with a fully weighted bag it has hardly seen any wear. It has definitely been recommended by me as well as bought a second time as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: JaredR

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find this kind of quality
customer_reviews.text: Every leather messenger bag I have bought for my husband ends up in the trash with a torn strap. I hate it because the rest of it is fine, but the straps always wear and eventually tear right at the joint where the strap meets the bag, but not on this bag. He's already had it longer than most, and it has held up great. It still looks new! And the smart design lets me know that someone knows a thing or two about straps that tear and how to avoid that. I think we finally found a keeper! Oh, and it's pretty good looking too. I actually like the color a lot more in person than in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Crystalero

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a messenger bag because I carry around a Surface Pro a lot. Everything fits and the strap is comfortable. I don't know anything about the color coming off on clothes. Hasn't happened to me and I can't quite see how it would. I could use at least one more inside pocket, but I make do with other small pouches, so it works. The outside front pockets are good for objects I'd like to be handy (little notebooks, pens, nail file, tissues, etc.). But I keep my wallet inside. The small handle is awkward, but I only use it to lift it out of the car or out when I can't reach the straps. It works.
customer_reviews.author: CWC

customer_reviews.title: Professional-looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a very professional, sharp-looking bag. Beautiful leather and nice stitching detail. I purchased the brown which is a very dark, almost espresso brown with lighter brown stitching. There is a good amount of storage and organization - outside zipper pocket, outside dual pockets under the top flap, cell phone holder, pen holder, inside zipper pocket, etc. My only complaint is I wish there was some kind of division or dual compartment within the interior of the bag in order to store a laptop on one side and various items on the other side. Overall, great buy! Not cheap, but you get what you pay for with these things.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey P.

customer_reviews.title: Is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Decent bag but nowhere near worth the 300.00 suggested retail price. The closing mechanism is a cheap magnet button clasp that doesn't even hold and you have to fiddle with it and try to align it. I have cheaper bags with a similar mechanism and the magnets force themselves together to close due to the strength of the magnets. These are cheap and poorly made and is a shame for such an expensive bag to begin with. The quality of the bag I am indifferent to. It looks nice but feel slightly cheap to the touch, considering the price tag that is a let down.
customer_reviews.author: wgs123

customer_reviews.title: Probably a nice bag if amazon could ship it the correct bag damage free
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cognac color and the first bag i received was scuffed with black markings on the front. Upon opening the bag the inside was punctured. Wanting a replacement because the bag looked really cool I waited for the amazon shipment. The second bag arrived and its color was vastly different, actually looking at the options they shipped me brown and not cognac.... It fits a macbook 13in and most likely a 15in macbook pro. I wouldn't stuff to many things in here though as the magnets are weak.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: It took a couple tries but he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to replacing an aging bag (the same one, which had lasted several years). The first one that came did not look like the same quality of our old one...it had some glue on the inside flap, and deep creases in the leather. I decided to send it back, and exchange for another. This one was perfect!! The leather was smooth and flawless. Interestingly, the packaging for each was different even though they were the same bag. He’s had it for several months now and loves it! We haven’t had any trouble with the quality or color transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3girls

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is overhyped. Not worth the money. Only one major pocket when you could get 10 pockets with other brands. Scratches on back. Looks like someone used it and returned it before. Also came in original packing displaying item rather than usual amazon’s box. Whoever responsible for packing needs to understand that privacy is utmost important to customers. Package was sitting in our command building entrance for to showcase that what I have ordered. I wish I could give zero ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the bag today - I had purchased the leather sealer also because of what another reviewer wrote about it. Apparently, there have been some complaints of the leather dye rubbing off? It took me 20 minutes to apply the leather sealer, no big deal, it actually made the leather look nicer. So far the bag is everything I wanted and expected when I placed the order. I like it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LukeStation

customer_reviews.title: Superior bag at bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice bag, especially for the price! I have a new job that has me working in a different location each day or week. This bag is a beautiful leather shoulder bag with a main pocket large enough for a 2" binder, a notebook, and room for additional documents. There are two smaller side pockets, one of which contains my AC charger for my phone. This bag is gorgeous and represents a superb deal at this price!
customer_reviews.author: "Laurie, not Lori"

customer_reviews.title: good for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my bf and he likes it a lot. The leather is good quality. He uses it for work every day because he takes his laptop back and forth. He now uses it every day and it replaced another messenger bag he had that was made out of a cloth material. It fits his 15" dell and a notebook. The big pockets in the front as you open the flap are particularly useful for things like his phone and his cigarettes.
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly23

customer_reviews.title: Definitely needed a coat of Resin
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I listend the reviews and bought an acrylic resin coating to put on the bag. Now the bag is perfect and durable. Replaced my exisiting Jack Spade bag very nicely! Acrylic coating can be found here:
customer_reviews.author: yoda889

customer_reviews.title: D- Quality
customer_reviews.text: Item is not made from genuine leather, magnetic clasps barely hold the flap shut, and the when held by the single handle, it causes the bag to tilt on its side, undoing the magnetic clasps dumping the contents or hovering awkwardly horizontally while carried. Very poorly designed
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M

customer_reviews.title: Solid daily-use messenger bag, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, $89.97, it's a great bag for my husband at work. Looks as pictured, definitely a more interesting tone of brown than the darker browns you tend to see on the subway. He's gotten a few compliments for it from people who think he spent $150+ on it. That said, the handle on the top is a bit useless to carry the bag - he always has to use the strap, but that suits his requirements. The quality is above par and looks like it will last for a bit. Will update if this changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. I've had it for a few years and it has been highly dependable. Bag looks great. Fits my books, macbook and notebooks. It has a great design, great color. Sleek and professional, also hip and cool. Some of the color has started to fade with rub against pants, so I suggest definitely moisturize and employ leather care/polish. If i ever have to retire this bag, I will be either buying another of the same kind or going back to kenneth cole.
customer_reviews.author: pbrindles

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Had this bag for several years and still looks great. Before I got this bag, I would carry all my stuff in plastics bags, looking like sort of semi homeless person, but this bag kicks up your style 100% Use it everyday for work to carry lunch, papers, etc, not padded enough for a laptop,but I guess you could use it that way. Never did anything to it as far as sealing or weatherizing....nothing. Never had the bleeding issue even though it got soaked many times in snow and rain.
customer_reviews.author: luv2cook

customer_reviews.title: Handsome, elegant, well-made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my father's natty canvas carry-on. This is an upgrade in every sense, and excellent quality for the money. The leather is buttery soft, the bag is easy to use, lightweight and holds form. A terrific buy, and he uses it each time he travels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for Years - LOVE them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually get one that is a bit larger (has a pocket designed for a small laptop, but was nicely surprised by this one, because it is so much less bulky and so much more pleasant to carry with me. I use it as a purse and my friends used to call it my "luggage," although I would have carried that "luggage" with me forever had it not simply been "time" for a new one. They are extremely high quality, wear well, feel great and are perfectly adjustable to your liking. LOVE this bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennei Preston

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Professional Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for what I use it for. I go to and from work by train and wanted a bag for a laptop, small lunch, and any random items I need to toss in. It has a very high quality for the price, it's basic and modern. I wasn't looking for the briefcase lawyer look. I will mention that I returned one bag because it had black spots and worn looking leather (which the manufacturer oddly warns of). The exchanged one looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Todd

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Needed for business it is perfect!  Highly recommend..excellent very professional looking!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful Messenger bag! My husband uses it for work, and it’s very professional! The color brown, is stunning! Absolutely love it, definitely recommend it! Well-made! I love Kenneth Cole! Products are always well-made, craftsmanship is beautiful, what can I say, we love it! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love leather!
customer_reviews.text: First one I got had some noticeable scuffs from handling, but the replacement I got is perfect. The leather is smooth and supple, yet sturdy. The bag has two versatile pouches under the flap which I use to hold my planner, phone charger, some pens, gum, etc. The main pocket can hold quite a bit. A laptop and a book, or a few binders... I use it to hold a book and a few large paper pads for studying. There is also a pouch on the back which can hold papers or documents. It's versatile and looks pretty sharp. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and great quality, not too many features
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mac Book pro 15” , I carry that and it’s charger and some other cables. Everything fits nice, but there is no cushioning at all , always worried when I put the briefcase down I will the Mac. None of the internal compartmens do have zippers, feels that if you put small things, you can loose them. Quality and looks 100 %
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: I liked the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and feel, but I returned them because my expensive-slippery laptop felt like it will fall out at any time. There is nothing to hold it but the magnetic flap which fails all the time. Also, the bag wouldn't even fit 2 medium sized college textbook with my 13 inch slim MacBook! Let alone my small water bottle or sandwich. If you are okay with these, you will get a good looking bag, but for a active college student, this doesn't work. I am ordering another bag from samsonite that looks more promising.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very professional looking, lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: I really love that I can store everything inside! I am doing my Masters program in Social work, so good to know I can safely wipe up spills on the surface without worrys.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Richards

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have had this bag 4 years now, I treat it poorly, over pack it often with 2 laptops and books, and it still looks great after years, a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: daviddsw

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bag
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bag. I am pleased with it so far. The leather looked dry when I received it so I used Woly Natural Waterstop to treat it and protect it. I think it can fit most any laptop. I have a large 16in and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Caysie

customer_reviews.title: This bag stains clothes!
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag for the first time today and it stained my new pants. The side on which I carried this bag had dark spots that are hard to get rid of. A very poor quality product! Super disappointed that I have to not only return this bag but also buy new pants.
customer_reviews.author: dmitry910204

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues with bleeding like others have mentioned (I chose the brown leather). While it comfortably fits my 15'' laptop and a notebook sized leather portfolio there isn't room for much else if you expect the front to close. The two front pockets will fit a wallet, keys, pens, and a phone, but not a laptop charger without popping the top out of the magnetic snaps. Size aside, if I have one big complaint its the bag's/strap's tendency to slide off my shoulder. I have never had this issue before with a messenger or a satchel so its slightly annoying, requiring constant adjustment. At this price, however, its not a deal breaker. So overall I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: swac870

customer_reviews.title: A great bag for work
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag to carry my laptop, lunch and various other items to and from work while still looking professional and stylish. My budget was pretty small, so some of the more expensive leather bags topping $500 were out of the question. This bag is exactly what I was looking for. Big enough for a 13 inch laptop (maybe 15inch even) my lunch, some pens, paper etc and a phone charger. The leather is very sturdy and the slight rugged look makes it look more stylish, but still professional. The stitching and build quality seem top notch, and I could not be happier with the color. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: S. Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because of the price and was not disappointed. It was a little larger than I expected. Easily fitting my Kindle 8.9" Fire in the inner zipped pocket. Great for traveling as a carry on bag that can fit your medications,grooming essentials, as well as room for your phone and wallet in the front pockets. You could always put a couple of small items of clothing if you had a long trip. As far as a "messenger bag" it is a little large to carry around. I would not use this for school supplies. It would not fit many school books plus a laptop. But as a small travel bag it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish & professional looking!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice case! My husband can fit his laptop & all of his files in here. It looks great too & is very professional looking. It’s a classy looking case that has lots of room but is not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: KristianL.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Stylish well made bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift fir a nurse friend. She uses it for traveling nusmrse duties for her laptop and paperwork. The quality is great. Soft supple leather, roomy and stylish. We both loved it.
customer_reviews.author: runforfun

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag!!! It is very attractive, durable, and has lots of pockets for organizing your gear. The shoulder strap has padding, so it is very comfortable to carry. I typically don't use the handle, as I have a fair amount of weight in it most of the time, and it doesn't balance well, but I don't think that detracts from the value of the bag at all. The more I carry it, the more attractive it becomes as the leather becomes smoother and darker where it rubs against my body. I carry this bag with me everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool and at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on this as I do all my purchases and for my needs it is exactly what I need. I read others reports on it and one helpful person mentioned that it is a bit too flexible. I noticed it has a full length zippered compartment inside from the photos and thought I can place reinforcement of mat board inside there to stiffen it. When it arrived I did just that and problem solved. Mat board is dense, thin board used in matting photographs and artwork. I am a photographer so I have a lot of it. Anyway, I love the color and the leather is quality. Everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Logan

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a Tumi bag that had served me well for many years. This one did not have the durability of the Tumi. The front snaps (which are actually magnetic) are the culprit. They came loose and eventually off less than six months after purchasing this bag. Not sure what the problem was. I travel a lot so it spent time in overhead bins and opening and closing the bag to retrieve items midflight. I would not purchase it again. It looks good but it's not terribly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Ryan

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LOOKING MESSENGER BAG
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BAG! I've never used one and didn't think I would like carrying one but have found it to be a godsend now that I ride public transportation to and from work. It not only looks good - I got the cognac colored bag and it goes with everything, but it carries everything from my lunch, soft drink, gloves, scarf and cap and umbrella with a bit of room to spare! I would still use this GREAT BAG if I stopped using public transportation.
customer_reviews.author: DALLAS RIDER

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, not for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and layout of this bag a lot. But the strap...it's not meant for carrying anything of significant weight. My 14 inch Thinkpad makes this feel like I'm dragging around a dead elephant with a chain over my shoulder. But if your heaviest item is an iPad and you've just got a binder and folders/papers then this is great. I love the inside pocket with the magnet that acts as a snap closure. NOT to be used with textbooks or laptops if you have to walk for more than 5 minutes or you'll regret it. But for hauling lightweight stuff (papers, iPad) it is a very soft material and looks great.

customer_reviews.title: The strap is the right length so it fits comfortable as a cross body bag
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for. My laptop, phone, wallet and paperwork fit in it perfectly with room to spare. The strap is the right length so it fits comfortable as a cross body bag. The leather is excellent. I have gotten many compliments and questions from my friends and associates. Not to mention I like the name Risky Business!
customer_reviews.author: William Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I would walk 500 miles
customer_reviews.text: And I would walk 500 more... This bag has been with me 4 years and 2000 miles of walk commuting. It’s comfortable and aging well. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E

customer_reviews.title: Is not secure enough to hold important items like your laptop and notebooks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my husband and at first he liked it and used it. Then he parked it after two days. The bag looks nicer but it not practical, except for the one button to close the, there is no inner zipper to secure your items and then to make matters worst the if you put too many items in the bag the flap keeps reopening.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: My son had same bag 4 years ago uses everyday he loved it but was just worn for his new career after graduation .
customer_reviews.author: Norma Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Overall, an excellent over the shoulder bag and a great value. Spacious enough for a tablet and/or small laptop. I like that really it has a handle in addition to the shoulder strap. This little extra was a difficult feature to find in this price range. The bag looks great and seems durable. The vendor, AnnasNYC, filled and shipped the bag on the same day it was ordered. I was extremely pleased with their service.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it is perfect for my MacBook pro 15-inches and there's plenty of space for the bulky charger and more. The leather texture is soft and it looks like it will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Julio Gabriel Royo

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag
customer_reviews.text: I carry a large note pad and laptop that’s equal in size. My pens, calculator, WiFi hub all fit nicely in the pockets provided.
customer_reviews.author: clay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect work bag. I have a brown one from two years ago, and a new black one. Holds my laptop and note pads, umbrella, etc. Sturdy. Stylish. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SCR

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I work at a bank. I see everyone with those suitcase sized bags...I don't get it - it's just lunch and a notebook. This bag is perfect. Yes, some-days it is SLIGHTLY too narrow but still, amazing bag. CONS: One con. That stupid handle on top: What were they thinking? It is on only one side of the bag so if you hold it by the handle the bag goes lopsided and yeah things will most likely spill out. I'll probably go so far as to cut it off because of how disappointed I am with it. Very poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: stylish value for money bag
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 3 days now, I have to say that I liked the material. I was planning to buy Tumi bag which was double the price of this one. But then decided to try this as the price was attractive and design was very similar. Leather is very soft compared with tumi which soft but felt more firm. I felt the leather too delicate for me as I tend to use it everyday and move around a lot. I feel that I might need to clean it and take care of it more often than I would with Tumi bag. Nonetheless, its a great bag for the money.
customer_reviews.author: adel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and looks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift and trusted product brand name! Recipient liked a lot and immediately used for his new position!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Soriano-Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I would definetely recommend this bag
customer_reviews.text: I realy enjoy this bag! Excellant quality and great dividers inside along with pen holders. The feel of the leather is top notch. I would definetely recommend this bag to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: TRIBALCHIEF

customer_reviews.title: This bag was a gift from my wife after my Lacoste bag's strap broke.
customer_reviews.text: This is now my presentation bag where my brand new 16" Macbook Pro resides very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: ED DAMES

customer_reviews.title: Great office bag
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Kenneth Cole Reaction Columbian Leather Messenger bag. Wow! It smells like great leather, feels very nice, and is very functional. This one is replacing a nylon Reaction bag that i have used every day for the past 11 years. While I hate to part with that bag, it is finally wearing thin. I am so pleased with the new leather bag,plus it has areas in the front pockets for your cell phone, pens, business cards, a roomy interior and zipper interior pocket, and a bonus pocket on the back outside of the bag. I am looking forward to all the compliments I'll be getting with my new Kenneth Cole bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sleek, and professional
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 2 weeks. It is comfortable to carry and holds my paperwork and surface pro perfectly. I wanted something that wasn't too bulky and this fits perfectly. The only drawback is that anything you carry has to be pretty flat. If you're carrying anything like a hard case for your glasses or a water bottle it will not fit in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kjahks

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a busy surgeon to keep up with important things!!
customer_reviews.author: g.cannon Mobile,Al

customer_reviews.title: ... Husband for our 1 year wedding anniversary and he loved it! He's been looking for a nice leather ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Husband for our 1 year wedding anniversary and he loved it! He's been looking for a nice leather messenger bag, but with so many to choose from, he didn't really know what he liked. I knew the strap had to have a padded area for his shoulder and I knew he would have wanted it slim looking and something that matched everything. This fit the bill! It came exactly how it looked, with it's rich chocolate color and smooth leather, he was very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: DN F.

customer_reviews.title: Love Kenneth Cole products
customer_reviews.text: The bag just barely fits my 15.6" dell laptop, so it does extend a bit past the 15.2" sizing. There is not much extra space, except two small pockets on the front (charger for the laptop fits as well as an EHD) and one big back pocket (notepad would fit, portfolio wouldn't). I didn't need a lot of space and wanted something light weight so this does well for me. The only bad thing to say is that it can scratch, but as long as it isn't a deep scratch it just adds to the semi-worn look of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice color/Fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality messenger bag for work and travel. It’s tilts a bit when you hold the bag from the handle when it’s full, but when using the shoulder strap it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Abelle

customer_reviews.title: vintage look but I would like him to alternate with this
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves the bag. He can slip his large iPad and loads of paperwork and even his water & lunch in this. There are multiple pockets, even on the outer back. He still uses the old one in a lighter camel color for the used, vintage look but I would like him to alternate with this. I definitely recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: but wouldn't recommend it for work
customer_reviews.text: ok as a casual bag and/or for school, but wouldn't recommend it for work. On the first day I used it strong new york wind opened the flap in the middle of the street in the rain since the magnetic seal is not very strong. The shoulder strap also does not rotate so it get's tangled up pretty easily. There are a couple other Kenneth Cole bags that are much better quality, like "I'm a flappy camper" and "Show business".
customer_reviews.author: D. A.

customer_reviews.title: No scratches or wear on this one! It looks great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my fiance for Christmas. I was a little worried because of previous posts that it arrived scratched or in poor condition. This was not the case for me. It was in perfect condition. The handle is a little awkward in that it's on the back of the bag and tilts forward a bit when you hold it. Other than that, it was exactly as I expected. He has not yet carried it so I don't know how well it holds up but it appears to be very well made so I'm not too worried. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: RobinO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a beautiful bag. It's a nice, deep brown and made of very soft leather. The strap is the perfect length for wearing cross-body. The interior is a good size for a college student or similar. I'm a grad student and I'm planning to carry my 13" MacBook, a large notebook, my Kindle Fire and a few paperbacks, and there is room for all of that. There are also helpful pockets for pens, cell phone, etc. Honestly I couldn't be happier with both the look and quality of this bag. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: The Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not roomy, but very fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I definitely love the feel of genuine leather. this bag is not too large, looks very handsome and fashionable both in casual attire and formal attire. I was worried if it would look too formal, but this bag looks good on almost any fit. Only downside of it is the inner space. If you are a type of person who carries things that take up lots of space, this bag is not for you. I don't carry much stuff, so it was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: JHP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking bag-not very practical
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my husband. We do like the bag (material very durable and nicely worked) but the size is rather small. It would be nice if it was a bit larger to fit more than just paperwork. Lunch box or water bottle doesn't fit in there at all so he has to carry it extra. Also the flap makes it a bit too complicated to get to your stuff and the little handle is placed weirdly so you don't use it much at all. He's not too excited about this bag. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy McCandy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag.
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag almost everyday. It looks good and is made of quality material. Big enough to hold a 15 inch laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Every-day use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bag for a year and a half or so now, every single day, to transport school books and work materials all over the city. It's held up well. I find it annoying that apparently I'm too short to use the padded section of the strap on my shoulder (I'm 5'6"), but in Seattle, where it rains constantly, a bag that doesn't let the rain in has been necessary. It's attractive and it was far and away the most affordable option for me. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Puhl

customer_reviews.title: It's stylish and is a really nice functional work bag for him
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband, and he loves it. It's stylish and is a really nice functional work bag for him. Unlike some of the reviews I read, the bag we received does have a space for a laptop and a (small) tablet. The reason I rated it 4 and not 5 stars is that the leather has some imperfections that look like mistakes made with the dyeing process. They don't particularly detract from the overall look of the bag, but it is a quality issue.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste K

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: After several false starts with other manufacturers, including Coach, I have found a great bag. It’s stylish and classical. The leather feels good. A good amount of organizing pockets. Great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bier

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It has inside pockets that are protected by the flap. It has an inside zipper pocket as well! It has an outside pocket for things you need quickly. Best of all, I can actually carry my iPad. The shoulder strap is great because it has a protected pad for your shoulder. Plus it has a handle to carry your bag if you don't want to use the shoulder strap. I have gotten so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: M. Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bag with some minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: The look is as advertised, very stylish and slim. It's made from natural leather so there are patterns and irregularities in color, but it adds to it's character. The first cons is rather weak magnet that is used as a locking mechanism. This could lead to inadvertent opening of your bag. Second is the lack of "backbone" - so unless you are carrying some book or solid item inside, it will bend and fold like crazy. This could be an advantage if you prefer it to copy the shape of your hip and back a little.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product iverall
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. Biggest complaint is that I have to use a backpack should I want to take a water bottle or my lunch or anything more than administrative basics like a laptop, notebook, pens, and phone charger. As a NYC commuter I do like it and it is stylish. For a messenger bag I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Zeus288

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag (one complaint)
customer_reviews.text: This bag is well made and holds us great. It holds a lot of stuff and the magnetic locks work perfect for me. This is the ideal bag for what i wanted. The only complaint I had was the strap CAN'T be shortened all the way because the metal clasped blocks the pad. I like to carry my bag higher so it was something I had to get used to. That said, most probably won't mind and it wasn't something I would take a star away from for it.
customer_reviews.author: MJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Has become my husbands favorite carry on bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my husband for his birthday. He needed a bag that would be good to use as a small carryon for travel. He loved it and uses it every time we travel. It is very pretty and made of a soft material. It is not very structurally sturdy in the sense that it does become a little floppy with use but it is sturdy in the sense that it can carry a lot of weight for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my sister who just got her accounting degree. She absolutely love the bag. I have no idea how its gonna hold up. Bought it based on the reviews from other people and I'm glad I did. It's real leather and very roomy inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mberry70

customer_reviews.title: Nice build, quality and texture.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a high quality bag. Just too small for my purposes. My mistake for not paying closer attention to product dimensions. Otherwise, I'm certain it will be a great bag for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable for what I paid for it. Holds way ...
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable for what I paid for it. Holds way more than it looks. Have to agree w previous comments about the attachments of the magnetic clips on the fabric rather than the leather. We'll c how it holds up long term.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: Very nice messenger bag. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A very nice bag for our son. It looks nice and elegant
customer_reviews.author: LM68

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Still looks new after several years of use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my husband several years ago. Still looks like new! It goes with him just about everyday and he is pretty rugged with carrying it. I'm sooo pleased I found and ordered this for him.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora gal

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. not sure what the other reviewers were talking about with the rubbing off of the dye, mine has not and it has gotten wet. It has performed as intended and I even went into the Kenneth Cole store near my house and they had the exact one for sale at $300. yikes! It came packed and labeled as a direct from factory item.
customer_reviews.author: Drecien

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast and gorgeous! UPDATE!!! Still absolutely gorgeous. My boyfriend has had it for approximately 4 months now and he love it. We have not seen another one like it anywhere. I had seen some of the reviews that said it rubbed off on clothing. Im not sure if they purchased theirs used, I did not, but he has not had that problem. Definitely a great gift, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: alxalj

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made, seams coming out along handle. Looks as if glue is oozing where handle is attached to bag, in the process of returning the bag.
customer_reviews.author: MelB

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very nice, the quality overall is ecellent. But its a bit smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Initial quality looks great....
customer_reviews.text: Haven't put it to good use yet but the appearance and the look of the quality is there. It is well designed for a messenger bag and I have a Saddleback Leather classic briefcase that is great but a bit too large for my day to day needs. Seeing if this will work for me--and will be crying if it does and I need to figure out how to unload my Saddleback one.....which is not cheap. Hope this one works out well....
customer_reviews.author: Hawk BB Fan

customer_reviews.title: Classy and cool.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is as soft as a baby's bottom. Looks nice and compact - but has tons of room. Product is all class - and what a price. One quibble - the strap is not as long as I'd like. I prefer when the bag can rest at the top of the hip - this one extends only to the middle of the back. Not much, but might be of interest. I don't think you'll find better out there for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Publius

customer_reviews.title: Well made, beautiful messenger bag!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful messenger bag! This is a gift for my son, who’s finishing medical school this year! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: George B. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag. The leather feels great, it fits my 14" laptop, and it could fit even a bigger one. You also can carry some more items. In the small pockets you can place the laptop charger and some other small items. It is a quality product, very well finished in every aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Morales Cubillo

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Bag that holds up well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for over a month now. Holds up really well. Switched to a 10.6" tablet, but it held my 13.3" very comfortably also with enough room for the charger. The inner section's pockets are really useful for holding a stylus or pens and small notebooks. The leather smell wears off after about 2 weeks, and I have not experienced any darkening of my clothes on the side that the bag rests. Great bag modern style bag.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: What a shame!!!
customer_reviews.text: Leather is good quality. Slips off shoulders though. When I wear it crossbody, feels like it’s choking me!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Maeda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality leather. Perfect for the business traveler.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Birthday present for hubby who flys a lot. He loves it. It fits his laptop iPad and all his other business needs. Stylish, professional and travels well. I foresee him having it for many years - until it becomes that soft buttery leather that we all love. It's well made and will endure many miles if travel.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: excellent bag
customer_reviews.text: Great buy pretty muhc anthning made by Kenneth Cole is going to ne super nice!
customer_reviews.author: FLSharkvictim

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade for the boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: Need a classy upgrade to canvas or messenger bag? Need some new way to make yourself more professional? Trying to appear both mature but also cool and sexy? Well, this bag somehow manages these once-thought-impossible feats. I can't explain how this happens. You are just going to have to believe me ...
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, free book?!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag with overnight shipping two days before Christmas for my boyfriend. It came on the 24th in pristine condition aside from your standard genuine leather irregularities and it looks incredibly classy. He really enjoyed it! This morning he finally switched bags for work and he asked me, "Did you put a book in here and forget to tell me?" I was obviously surprised and said no, and when he showed it to me and it was some random book called "Culinary Capital" which is neat and also strangely relevant because I happen to be a chef! Doubt that was supposed to happen but hey, another book to add to my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Aedra

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and value
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Holds just enough for a business trip and looks smart for a great price. So far has held up great (about a year I think).
customer_reviews.author: Franzfelder Roots

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Soft leather, quality bag. My husband uses as a briefcase for work, not as a laptop bag. Good quality, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry P

customer_reviews.title: Has Held Up Great After A Whole Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my dad as Christmas gift in 2014, he carries it with him every day to and from work and wherever else he may go. It's still in great condition after a year of daily use. He absolutely loved it. I always have a really hard time finding gifts for him because he has everything he needs and wants already. He said it was one of the best gifts he had ever received. I highly recommend this bag as it is nice quality material and a nice amount of space inside.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Meza

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, doesn't rub off
customer_reviews.text: Overall the bag is sturdy, looks good, and holds a lot. It looks good both full and empty, and I love it. It's a great size for holding my 15.3" laptop. Several other comments have complained about the dye rubbing off, but I have not had that problem at all. I wore this for two days in a row over khakis and noticed nothing at all. My color was Dark Brown.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, not for laptops.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great messenger bag but I hadn't read the reviews and missed the fact that it did not contain a laptop pocket and had no support to protect a laptop. Depending on what you are looking for this bag could be perfect. It was a great color and soft leather which I really liked. Only reason I returned it was because of the laptop pocket.
customer_reviews.author: shopperd

customer_reviews.title: Quality This is a beautiful bag and the leather is of great quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality This is a beautiful bag and the leather is of great quality! It looks like it would cost quite a bit more and this is the best price I found it anywhere!! I bought one for my son in law as a gift and got one for my son also because I liked it so much!! Great strap, good size and love how the cover folds over and a magnet holds it in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: valerie rahn

customer_reviews.title: It’s great! I get Loya of complements on it
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! I get Loya of complements on it. It’s very professional ... if that’s what you’re going for ... make the purchase you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Auricle2014

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bag - needs a bit of support to keep its shape
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of craftsmanship at a great price. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because there is nothing on the bottom or sides to help it keep its shape (canvas ones I owned had bottom "shelf") - so if you're carrying anything besides papers it looks a bit like a purse (supple leather). Just making that suggestion if they want to improve upon it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark-Miami

customer_reviews.title: Floppy, but functional
customer_reviews.text: The back is much too large for my 13" MacBook Pro, but it will do for now. I seem to be going through bags every six months, and this seems the sturdiest one yet, my fourth in two years. The straps, handles or fabric have disintegrated on the other three. Not so here. However, I wish it had more padding for my computer. It's simply an oversized soft leather envelope.
customer_reviews.author: Kenninghouse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Looks great, wears great, and works with all manner of clothing styles. The phone pocket could be a little bigger (doesn't fit phone with a case), but I just carry it in my pocket anyway. Another plus is its softness. Don't expect a hard leather; this thing's flexible and moulds to your leg/hip when worn.
customer_reviews.author: MellowJello

product_meta.title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Risky Business Messenger Full-Grain Colombian Leather Crossbody Laptop Case & Tablet Day Bag, Dark Brown, One Size
product_meta.description:
Color:Dark BrownColombian Leather Single Gusset Flapover Messenger Bag “Risky Business”. Full Grain Cowhide Leather Exterior Body Material With Fully Lined Interior. Front Gusset Pockets Have Organizer Features, Including A Cell Phone Pocket. Roomy Main Compartment Features A Full Length Zipper Pocket. Convenient Top Handle. Rear Exterior Open Pocket For Easy Access To Frequently Needed Items. Adjustable And Padded Shoulder Strap. This leather is a natural material and therefore subject to change from hide to hide and with daily use. The distressed appearance with occasional blemishes and variance in color is normal and does not mean there is any quality issue with the product. Irregularities in the consistency of this leather are inherent of its natural beauty and personality. Manufacturer Lifetime Limited Warranty. Size: 15.0” L x 11.0” H x 3.0” D. Weight: 2.2 Lbs.

AMAZON.COM
Keep your belongings, and yourself, stylishly organized with Kenneth Cole’s lovely messenger bag. Contrast stitching accents its rich leather body, while a short handle and long, adjustable strap keep your carrying options open. The flap closure opens up to reveal a roomy main compartment, complete with a full-length zipper pocket for your smaller necessities. Front gusseted pockets include a cell phone pocket to keep it handy and within reach.
feature_bullets: This leather laptop travel messenger bag is made of a luxurious, full-grain cowhide Colombian leather that is very durable and ages beautifully, creating a bag that is uniquely your own. The interior also features a fully-lined, tear-resistant lining to stand up to daily use.

Slim messenger bag construction with dual magnetic closures under the leather flap. Roomy main compartment can fit documents, everyday essentials, a laptop or tablet, and features a full-length zipper pocket. Rear exterior open pocket for easy-access to frequently needed items.

The Full-Grain Genuine Colombian leather used in crafting this bag is a natural cowhide that is minimally treated. As a result each bag will be slightly different and have its own unique characteristics that will age well with use. You may notice imperfections and color variations in the leather, which is normal. This is made of 100% genuine full-grain Colombian leather; no substitute leathers were used and no split leathers were used.
Longer strap is adjustable from 20 inches to 24 inches. Shorter strap has a drop of 3 inches
Two front organizer pouches with cell phone pocket, two pen pockets, three card slots

Features a permanent, padded, and adjustable shoulder strap that extends 60 inches for comfortable carryign while on the move. Convenient top leather grab handle for easy carrying when needed. Main compartment is large enough to fit most tablets and laptop computers with up to a 15.6-Inch screen.
Overall Size: 15” L x 11” H x 3” D. Product Weight: 2.2 lbs. The perfect slim leather messenger travel bag for the modern traveler whom values both style and function.

specifications.Series: Risky Business Messenger Bag Full-grain Colombian Leather Laptop Case & Tablet Day Bag for School, Work, & Travel
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,250 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
